## Carry Recipe
_Double Hammock Double Rings – Base Size Minus 3 – 2 Traditional Sling Passes + 2 Bunched Reinforcing Passes_

- Off center Traditional Sling Pass over baby on back with short tail over shoulder
- Bunched chest pass with long tail
- Traditional Sling Pass over baby
- Bring tails over shoulders and feed sling rings on
- Tuck tails under chest pass and back through sling rings
